panels.description: A count of how many times the /json endpoint has been accessed since the device last powered on
panels.title: JSON access

panels.description: How long in seconds the sensor has been running for
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description:
The number of successful HTTP requests sent by the device.
The total number of HTTP requests sent by the device.

panels.description: The WiFi signal strength of the connected WiFi network

panels.description: The rate at which the sensor is reporting data
panels.title: Logging rate

panels.description: The number of seconds the last 2-minute average recorded data for. This should typically have a value of 120
panels.title: Period
